thread.title: Revealed: the 10 Premier League strikers with the worst record in front of goal this season
thread.title_full: Revealed: the 10 Premier League strikers with the worst record in front of goal this season

author: Richard Innes
title: Revealed: the 10 Premier League strikers with the worst record in front of goal this season
text:
Yes, Simone Zaza and Vincent Janssen both feature in this top 10 (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily   Could   
Welcome to the Premier League list no attacking player wants to be on. 
As a top-flight forward/striker/inverted winger, if you have plenty of shots at goal, you are expected to score a few. It's a fairly simple equation. 
That is why we thought we would see who has had the most shots this season so far… and not scored with ANY of them. You can see the very revealing top 10 below. A few things to bear in mind before you do: The total number of shots for each player includes every shot they have had in all competitions during 2016/17. We have excluded penalties (they are WAY too easy) - so don't moan that so-and-so has actually scored a spot-kick. If you support West Ham or Tottenham, prepare to feel some righteous indignation… =10. Jesus Navas (Man City) 11 shots without scoring
